amendment.description: Amendment sought to continue the Drug Court Program as enacted by the Violent Crime and Prevention Act of 1994.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to permit the Attorney General to make grants available to States and local governments to maintain the existing Drug Court program, a program repealed by the provisions of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mfume amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 266 (Roll no. 121).
